Tin Roof – A Live Music Joint
Delicious food, drinks, & live entertainment across two rooms and a large patio on Atlantic Ave in the heart of Delray Beach!
Live Music & Good Times
Tin Roof is about giving musicians a place to play and and a place to hang when they aren’t onstage.  The tasty food, fun, eclectic environment, community of Regulars, and friendly Crew have established the Roof as the place to be for musicians and non-musicians alike. Over the years, our stages have hosted the famous, the should have been famous, and everyone in between!
VIEW LIVE MUSIC & EVENTS CALENDAR
Our Chefs Rock As Much As Our Musicians
We’re famous for our live music, but we also serve delicious, fresh ‘Better Than Bar Food’!  Quesadillas, sandwiches, the best wings & tenders in Delray Beach & more have made the Roof a popular spot for eating, drinking & enjoying entertainment for years.
View Food Menu
Catch the Game at Tin Roof
Tons of TV’s & tasty food make the Roof a great game watch spot for your favorite team! Lots of seating options so great for groups of all sizes.
Thanks For Being A Regular
Tin Roof features two separate rooms of entertainment & dining with a large patio in the middle located on Atlantic Ave in Delray Beach. Tasty food, multiple bars, lots of TVs and great live music & entertainment make Tin Roof a great spot for any occasion.
Get DIRECTIONS to Tin Roof in Delray Beach
GROUP PARTIES & EVENTS
Besides offering a great time & best in class entertainment, Tin Roof is great for hosting group events & parties!
Contact
Melina@tinroofbars.com
for details.
Whether you’re coming for the tunes, the food, the drinks or just a good time, enjoy the Roof ‘Where Everybody is Somebody’! Support live music and the musicians that bring it to us, and we’ll hope to see ya enough to call you a Regular!

GROUP PARTIES & EVENTS
GROUP EVENT
Host your special event or party with us at Tin Roof Delray Beach on Atlantic Ave. No matter the occasion, you and your guests will enjoy the fun atmosphere, our southern inspired made from scratch food, ice-cold beverages, and great event staff to make your party a hit.
At the Roof, we offer indoor and outdoor event spaces and can host groups of all sizes for a private or semi-private event.  Looking for an excellent location for your bachelorette party or birthday celebration?  We can help you with that too!  Please use the form below for more information.
book your event
MAIN ROOM VIRTUAL TOUR
GREEN ROOM VIRTUAL TOUR
Download Event Menu
FAQ
CORPORATE GROUPS
HOST YOUR CORPORATE GROUP AT THE ROOF!
Tin Roof is the perfect place to bring your corporate group.   We offer customized food, drink and entertainment packages. Let us plan your unforgettable event!
Request Information
BACHELORETTE & BIRTHDAY PARTIES
CELEBRATE WITH THE ROOF!
Whether you are hosting a bachelorette party, bachelor party, birthday or any small group ready to party big, Tin Roof is the place to celebrate from brunch to late night!
Request INformation
GROUP PARTIES FOR ANY OCCASION!
FLEXIBLE SPACE & CUSTOM PACKAGES AVAILABLE
Got a crew and need some space to get together? We are happy to customize for groups of all sizes & needs.  Company happy hours, birthdays & bachelorette parties, small & large parties for any occasion… give us a shout!
request information
HAPPY HOUR EVENTS
HOST YOUR HAPPY HOUR AT THE ROOF!
Bring your group in for the perfect happy hour event. We offer appetizer and drink packages for groups of all sizes.
